languages.text: "Пусть так". {n}Винтерскейл устало вздыхает.{/n} "Не хочу, чтобы ты заблуждал{mf|ся|ась}, будто я отчаянно хватаюсь за жизнь. У меня смышленные наследники... Не все, конечно. Но я буду болеть за них с той стороны — чтоб не давали тебе скучать". {n}Винтерскейл насмешливо кривится и прикрывает глаза.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Пусть так". {n}Винтерскейл устало вздыхает.{/n} "Не хочу, чтобы ты заблуждал{mf|ся|ась}, будто я отчаянно хватаюсь за жизнь. У меня смышленные наследники... Не все, конечно. Но я буду болеть за них с той стороны — чтоб не давали тебе скучать". {n}Винтерскейл насмешливо кривится и прикрывает глаза.{/n}

languages.text: "Have it your way." {n}Calligos lets out a tired sigh.{/n} "I don't want you to think that I am desperately clinging to life. My successors are sharp... not all of them, of course. But I will be rooting for them from the other side — so that they keep things interesting for you." {n}He twists his lips mockingly and closes his eyes.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Пусть так". {n}Винтерскейл устало вздыхает.{/n} "Не хочу, чтобы ты заблуждал{mf|ся|ась}, будто я отчаянно хватаюсь за жизнь. У меня смышленные наследники... Не все, конечно. Но я буду болеть за них с той стороны — чтоб не давали тебе скучать". {n}Винтерскейл насмешливо кривится и прикрывает глаза.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "So be it." {n}Winterscale lets out a tired sigh.{/n} "I don't want you to think that I am desperately clinging to my life. My successors are clever... Not all of them, of course. But I will cheer for them from the other side — so they would keep you on your toes." {n}Winterscale twists his lips mockingly and closes his eyes.{/n}

"So be it." {n}Winterscale lets out a tired sigh.{/n} "I don't want you to think that I am desperately clinging to my life. My successors are clever... Not all of them, of course. But I will cheer for them from the other side — so they would keep you on your toes." {n}Winterscale twists his lips mockingly and closes his eyes.{/n}

But I will cheer for them from the other side — so they would keep you on your toes." {n}Winterscale twists his lips mockingly and closes his eyes.{/n}

But I will cheer for them from the other side — so they would keep you on your toes." {n}Winterscale twists his lips mockingly and closes his eyes.{/n}

"Have it your way." {n}Calligos lets out a tired sigh.{/n} "I don't want you to think that I am desperately clinging to life. My successors are sharp... not all of them, of course. But I will be rooting for them from the other side — so that they keep things interesting for you." {n}He twists his lips mockingly and closes his eyes.{/n}

"Have it your way." {n}Calligos lets out a tired sigh.{/n} "I don't want you to think that I am desperately clinging to life. My successors are sharp... not all of them, of course. But I will be rooting for them from the other side — so that they keep things interesting for you." {n}He twists his lips mockingly and closes his eyes.{/n}

languages.text: «Como quiera». {n}Calligos deja escapar un suspiro de cansancio.{/n} «No quiero que piense que me aferro desesperadamente a la vida. Mis sucesores son astutos... No todos, claro; pero les animaré desde el otro lado para que las cosas sigan siendo interesantes para usted». {n}Winterscale tuerce los labios en una mueca de burla y cierra los ojos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Have it your way." {n}Calligos lets out a tired sigh.{/n} "I don't want you to think that I am desperately clinging to life. My successors are sharp... not all of them, of course. But I will be rooting for them from the other side — so that they keep things interesting for you." {n}He twists his lips mockingly and closes his eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Que así sea». {n}Winterscale deja escapar un suspiro de cansancio.{/n} «No quiero que piense que me aferro desesperadamente a la vida. Mis sucesores son astutos... No todos, claro; pero les alentaré desde el otro lado para que no le permitan bajar la guardia». {n}Winterscale tuerce los labios en una mueca de burla y cierra los ojos.{/n}

languages.text: “随你便吧。”{n}卡里戈斯疲惫地叹息道。{/n}“我可不想让你以为我打算拼命求饶。我的继承者们很聪明……当然，并不是所有人都很精明，但我会在另一边支持他们。这样一来，他们就能令你一直如芒在背了。”{n}他嘲弄地扭着嘴唇，然后闭上了眼睛。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Have it your way." {n}Calligos lets out a tired sigh.{/n} "I don't want you to think that I am desperately clinging to life. My successors are sharp... not all of them, of course. But I will be rooting for them from the other side — so that they keep things interesting for you." {n}He twists his lips mockingly and closes his eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “那就这样吧。”{n}温特斯凯尔疲惫地叹息道。{/n}“我可不想让你以为我打算拼命求饶。我的继承者们很聪明……当然，并不是所有人都很聪明，但我会在另一边替他们加油。这样以来，他们就能令你一直如芒在背了。”{n}温特斯凯尔嘲弄地扭了扭嘴角，然后闭上了眼睛。{/n}

languages.text: « Comme vous voudrez, {n}concède Calligos en poussant un soupir fatigué.{/n} N'allez pas croire que je m'accroche désespérément à la vie. Mes successeurs sont malins... à quelques exceptions près, évidemment, mais je les encouragerai depuis l'au-delà pour qu'ils vous divertissent comme il se doit. » {n}Il vous adresse un sourire moqueur, puis il ferme les yeux.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Have it your way." {n}Calligos lets out a tired sigh.{/n} "I don't want you to think that I am desperately clinging to life. My successors are sharp... not all of them, of course. But I will be rooting for them from the other side — so that they keep things interesting for you." {n}He twists his lips mockingly and closes his eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Comme vous voudrez, {n}concède Calligos en poussant un soupir fatigué.{/n} N'allez pas croire que je m'accroche désespérément à la vie. Mes successeurs sont malins... à quelques exceptions près, évidemment, mais je les encouragerai depuis l'au-delà pour qu'ils vous divertissent comme il se doit. » {n}Il vous adresse un sourire moqueur, puis il ferme les yeux.{/n}

languages.text: 「勝手にしろ」{n}カリゴスは疲れたようなため息をつく。{/n}「俺が必死に命にしがみついていると思われたくない。俺の後継者たちは賢い…もちろん、全員がそうではないがな。だが、俺はあの世から彼らを応援しよう。そうすれば、連中はお前にとっても興味深い存在で有り続けるだろうさ」{n}彼は嘲るように唇を歪め、目を閉じる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Have it your way." {n}Calligos lets out a tired sigh.{/n} "I don't want you to think that I am desperately clinging to life. My successors are sharp... not all of them, of course. But I will be rooting for them from the other side — so that they keep things interesting for you." {n}He twists his lips mockingly and closes his eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「それでいい」{n}ウィンタースケールは疲れたようなため息をつく。{/n}「俺が必死に命にしがみついていると思われたくない。俺の後継者たちは賢い…もちろん、全員がそうではないがな。だが、俺はあの世から彼らを応援しよう。そうすれば、彼らはあなたの気を引き締めてくれるだろうさ」{n}ウィンタースケールは嘲るように唇を歪め、目を閉じる。{/n}

languages.text: "Wie Ihr wollt." {n}Calligos stößt ein müdes Seufzen aus.{/n} "Ihr sollt nicht glauben, dass ich mich verzweifelt ans Leben klammere. Meine Nachfolger sind scharf ... nicht alle, versteht sich. Aber ich werde ihnen auf der anderen Seite die Daumen drücken ... damit es für Euch interessant bleibt." {n}Er verzieht seine Lippen zu einem spöttischen Lächeln und schließt die Augen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Have it your way." {n}Calligos lets out a tired sigh.{/n} "I don't want you to think that I am desperately clinging to life. My successors are sharp... not all of them, of course. But I will be rooting for them from the other side — so that they keep things interesting for you." {n}He twists his lips mockingly and closes his eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "So sei es." {n}Winterzunder stößt ein müdes Seufzen aus.{/n} "Ihr sollt nicht glauben, dass ich mich verzweifelt ans Leben klammere. Meine Nachfolger sind klug ... Nicht alle, versteht sich. Aber ich werde sie von der anderen Seite aus anfeuern — damit sie Euch auf Trab halten." {n}Winterzunder verzieht seine Lippen zu einem spöttischen Grinsen und schließt die Augen.{/n}
